reviewText: A must watch! This documentary takes you inside the mindset and eyes of those who lived this great (American) tragedy. It is important to know what really happened not only of the storm it self,but the after effects that was almost if not worst then the storm (of cat5 hurricane) it self.

There are some stunning visuals in the production, but perhaps I am biased for having lived through this disaster and may be too close to the material.  But to have "talking heads" describe what he or she did and then actors vaguely resembling them, play out the scene, is vaguely disconcerting.
